###############################################
#####CALCULATION PRICE OF CO-SKEWNESS RISK#####
###############################################

```{r, Risk-Neutral Second Moment}
data_VIX <- read.csv("^VXO.csv")
data_VIX <- as.data.frame(data_VIX) 
data_VIX$Date <- as.Date(data_VIX$Date) 
data_VIX$Adj.Close <- as.numeric(data_VIX$Adj.Close)
data_VIX <- select(data_VIX, -c(Open, Low, High, Close, Volume)) %>% arrange(Date) %>% filter(Date < "2012-12-31") %>% mutate(Indexed=Adj.Close/100) %>% mutate(Square=Indexed^2)

```

```{r}
library(psych)
table1_data<-describe(data_VIX$Square)
plot(data_VIX$Date,data_VIX$Square, type="l")
```
